spec_data.Name: salt-cloud
spec_data.Description:
The salt-cloud tool provisions new cloud VMs, installs salt-minion on them, and
adds them to the master's collection of controllable minions.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 15 Aug 2017 01:45:21 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Cloud provisioner for Salt, a parallel remote execution system
